articles.description: How can the Warriors stop Luka Doncic? Can the Mavs duplicate a defense that stifled the Phoenix Suns' electric offense? Here are the five biggest storylines that will define the series.
articles.content: Luka Doncic, over the weekend, eviscerated the NBA's best team -- and he did it with a smile. Time and again, he read the Phoenix Suns' defense from the top of the floor, waited for it to commit itse… [+13499 chars]

articles.title: 'Will be a great bowler for India': Vaas' bold prediction on uncapped youngster - Hindustan Times
articles.description: IPL 2022: Sri Lanka pace legend Chaminda Vaas made a bold prediction on the uncapped Indian youngster, insisting that his performances are improving ‘day by day’.
articles.content: The 2022 edition of the Indian Premier League has seen an emergence of quality youngsters in the country's domestic setup. While players like Tilak Varma and Abhishek Sharma have stood out among batt… [+1649 chars]

articles.title: Pietersen on 'KKR's dismal show': 'Players think they have to perform or be out' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Former England captain Kevin Pietersen has called Kolkata Knight Riders' campaign in IPL 2022 and feels that too much chopping and changing has hampered the team massively in the ongoing edition of the Indian Premier League.

articles.author: Shashank Kishore
articles.title: VVS Laxman to coach India on Ireland tour - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He will fill in for head coach Rahul Dravid who will instead assist India's prep in England
articles.content: VVS Laxman was in charge of the India Under-19 side that won the World Cup earlier this year  •  ICC/Getty Images
